This event stops the players movement and prevents opening
the menu when a scene is happening.
Set blank events to take the wanted sprites;
set their locations and make the current sprites hidden.
Uncheck "wait for completion" in set movemement.
Tint the screen and start a screen roll after that FadeIn.

\pop[33]Dr. A walked through here, I should follow her!
Once you proceed to this area, there's no coming back.
You need to be atleast level 10 to proceed.
You may choose to level up your character which will help you
1. You turn back and try to walk in, but the door is jammed
2. You see a lot of dementors, either try to fight them or avoid them
3. You see Dr. A on the side of the road and try to follow her
4. Transfer the player into final boss battle future path
